variants.Description in input context: This variant results in a change of the amino acid at position 624.

Readout description.Result Description: The variant resulted in a complete absence of the protein.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in duplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type plasmid was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: One-way ANOVA followed by Tukey's post-hoc test was used.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Presence of the expected protein band of the correct size.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Absence or drastic reduction in the protein band.
